general_advisory: Sowing of rabi crops like mustard/toria, sunflower should not be delayed to get maximum yield. Due to cloudy & foggy weather check regularly for any disease and pest attack in crops & vegetables. Provide necessary irrigation to standing crops & vegetables.

advisory: Remove the false smut affected paddy panicles during harvesting and threshing process.
Make the threshing floor and storage ground clean and disinfectant the same.
Grains must be dried under sun for 3-4 days to 14% moisture for consumption and 12% moisture for seed purpose.
Clean the storage go down properly and spray Lambda Cyahalothrin 4.9CS@1.5ml/li of water to minimize the chance of future infestation of storage pest.
Check for diseases & other pests in mustard due to foggy weather.
Provide irrigation to the crop if necessary.
50%N and all P2O5 and K2O fertilizers should be applied as basal.
Application of Bentonite Sulphur @30kg/ha for increasing the oil content. Otherwise select Grommer (20:20:0:13) and MOP as a source of N,P,K & S.
Select high yielding and mosaic disease resistant varieties of legume vegetables like French bean & cowpea and complete transplanting as early as possible.
In cucurbit crops there may be chances of infestation of Tobacco caterpillar & cabbage Webber, to prevent this, apply flubendiamide @70ml per acre with 200 liters of water.

As the winter is in the starting phase, there is a possibility of 'EUS' disease in fish. Farmers are advised to apply 'Cifax' @400 ml mixed with 40 liters of water in one acre pond area as a preventive measure.

Animals should be given mineral mixture along with salt regularly and wheat grains, jaggery etc. may be provided @10%-20% in the daily ration during winter season to meet the energy requirement of the animals.
